title: A true report of the seruice done vpon certaine gallies passing through the narrow seas written to the Lord high Admirall of England, by Sir Robert Mansel knight, admirall of her maiesties forces in that place.
author: Mansell, Robert, Sir, 1568 or 9-1656.
publisher: Printed by Felix Kingston, and are to be sold by Iohn Newbery, at his shop in Paules churchyard,
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
